effect.text: Shuffle 2 of the other cards from your hand into your deck in order to draw a card.

requirements.description: Must have at least 2 other cards in hand besides Maintenance
Must have at least 1 card in deck to draw

tips: Only use when the 2 cards being shuffled back are genuinely useless in current situation
Best used when you have excess Energy cards clogging your hand
Can be valuable in late game to recycle important cards back into a thin deck
Consider using before Professor Oak to save cards you want to keep
In most decks, Bill or Professor Oak are superior choices for consistency

rulings.ruling: You must have at least 2 other cards in your hand besides Maintenance to play this card
You must shuffle exactly 2 cards from your hand into your deck - you cannot shuffle fewer
After shuffling the 2 cards in, you draw 1 card from your deck
If your deck has no cards remaining, you cannot play Maintenance (you must be able to complete the draw)
The 2 cards shuffled in can be any combination of Pokemon, Energy, or Trainer cards
Shuffle your deck thoroughly after putting the 2 cards in and before drawing
